steps.section: Resuspension, Purification, and Preparation of Working Aliquots of Oligos
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b6d3r","text":"RESUSPENSION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jm73","text":"Record all data or attach the technical sheet of the oligo in the logbook.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qkaj","text":"Ensure the lyophilized tube is well-sealed and centrifuge for 1 minute at 5000 rpm.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28sj4","text":"In a sterile, airflow-free hood, open the tube and add 200 µL of sterile DEPC H2O. Seal and vortex at medium speed for 30 seconds.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97fk5","text":"Spin briefly in the centrifuge, resuspend gently six times with a 200 µL micropipette. Transfer 100 µL to a sterile 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube. Store the original tube at -20°C until use.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Resuspension, Purification, and Preparation of Working Aliquots of Oligos
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aabhd","text":"PURIFICATION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s37h","text":"Add 20 µL of 3M Sodium Acetate to the Eppendorf tube containing 100 µL. Mix thoroughly, then add 700 µL of cold absolute ethanol. Mix by inversion eight times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nren","text":"Incubate at -70°C for 1 hour.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c292","text":"Centrifuge at 4°C for 20 minutes at 14,000 rpm.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e6tg","text":"Discard the supernatant without touching the pellet. Wash with 100 µL of cold 70% ethanol (adding along the tube wall). Mix by inversion three times.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rdr6","text":"Centrifuge at 4°C for 10 minutes at 14,000 rpm. Decant the supernatant and dry in a concentrator for around 5 minutes at medium temperature.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5c8p","text":"Resuspend in 30-50 µL of sterile DEPC H2O, depending on the pellet size. Mix thoroughly by flicking the tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Resuspension, Purification, and Preparation of Working Aliquots of Oligos
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ao3pk","text":"QUANTIFICATION","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg0ql","text":"Dilute 1:50 and measure with a Nanodrop (menu \u003e nucleic acids \u003e ssDNA-33).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3me2","text":"Calculate to prepare a 20 µM working solution (www.idtdna.com).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9vjl","text":"Verify integrity and concentration by densitometry of the oligo on a 2% agarose gel in 1X TBE (run electrophoresis for 10 minutes at 100 volts, then 60 minutes at 80 volts, and 10 minutes at 100 volts).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Resuspension, Purification, and Preparation of Working Aliquots of Oligos
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3bp0","text":"ALIQUOTING","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98ogt","text":"Label 0.5 mL Eppendorf tubes with: oligo name, concentration, date, preparer’s name, and volume.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kafn","text":"Aliquot the working solutions and store at -20°C until use.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"8hql8","text":"Handle ethidium bromide with care as it is a potent mutagen; always wear gloves and work in a designated area.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ebb4","text":"Ensure proper ventilation when working with volatile chemicals like ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31qj5","text":"Dispose of all biological and chemical waste according to your institution's safety guidelines.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63nvf","text":"Avoid direct contact with DEPC water as it is toxic; use appropriate handling techniques.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7gd2","text":"Follow centrifuge safety protocols to prevent accidents due to imbalanced tubes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"852d3","text":"Make sure to seal all tubes and capillaries tightly to avoid spillage or contamination.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
